#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define lli long long
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define gc getchar
#define lld "%I64d"
#define DEBUG(x) cout<<">value ("<<#x<<") : "<<x<<endl;
#define mod 1000000007
#define llu unsigned long long

int main(){
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d",&n);
        if(n&(n-1))
            printf("BMEENA\n");
        else
            printf("BKUL\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
